bill.title: Relating To County Access To Private Property.
bill.description: Authorizes the counties, through their employees or authorized agents, to enter private property to control or eradicate invasive species and pests. (HB606 CD1)

referrals.name: Public Safety, Intergovernmental and Military Affairs

history.action: Pending introduction.
Pass First Reading
Referred to EEP, JUD, referral sheet 3
Bill scheduled to be heard by EEP on Tuesday, 01-31-17 8:30AM in House conference room 325.
Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org

The committees on EEP recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) C. Lee, Lowen, Cullen, Evans, Ichiyama, Kong, Say, Yamane; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Fukumoto.
Reported from EEP (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 9) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.
Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Ing excused (1).
Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Friday, 02-24-17 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 11 Ayes: Representative(s) Nishimoto, San Buenaventura, Belatti, Brower, Johanson, C. Lee, Morikawa, Nakashima, Oshiro, McDermott, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 995) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 03-07-17.
Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Ichiyama excused (1). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 277).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to PSM/AEN, JDL.
The committee(s) on PSM/AEN has scheduled a public hearing on 03-17-17 1:30PM in conference room 224.

The committee(s) on PSM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in PSM were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Nishihara, Baker, Ihara, L. Thielen; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Wakai.

The committee(s) on AEN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in AEN were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Gabbard, Riviere, Nishihara, K. Rhoads, Ruderman; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from PSM/AEN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 952) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to JDL.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to JDL.
The committee(s) on JDL will hold a public decision making on 03-29-17 9:30AM in conference room 016.

The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Keith-Agaran, K. Rhoads, Kim; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Gabbard, L. Thielen.
Reported from JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1465) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
48 Hrs. Notice 04-11-17.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 594) in amended form (SD 2).
House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
House Conferees Appointed: C. Lee, San Buenaventura Co-Chairs; Lowen, Tupola.
Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 585).
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 586).
Senate Conferees Appointed: Nishihara Chair; Gabbard, Keith-Agaran Co-Chairs.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 680).
Bill scheduled for Conference Committee Meeting on Tuesday, 04-25-17 11:00AM in conference room 225.

The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 3 Ayes: Representative(s) C. Lee, San Buenaventura, Lowen; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Tupola.

The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 2 Aye(s): Senator(s) Nishihara, Gabbard; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Keith-Agaran.
Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 31) as amended in (CD 1).
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 05-02-17
Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 31).
48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 05-02-17.
Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1). 25 Aye(s); Aye(s) with reservations: none . 0 No(es): none. 0 Excused: none.
Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0).
Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 737).
Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 642).
Transmitted to Governor.
